argument.name: stopwhendocked
argument.desc: stop if leader is docked at same

argument.name: stopwhenOOS
argument.desc: stop if leader is out of sector

line.comment: * $stopwhenOOS isn't passed, but we don't care.
* 3.18: fleet ships attack the leader's target if it's a station, whatever the fleet setting is.
* We don't call !move.movetoobject because we need the follow command to return after $timeout.
* The AI will recycle damaged ships.
* skip if $leader-> is of class [Moveable Ship]
* Is leader docked or out of sector?

sval.val: stop if leader is docked at same
stop if leader is out of sector
$stopwhenOOS isn't passed, but we don't care.
3.18: fleet ships attack the leader's target if it's a station, whatever the fleet setting is.
We don't call !move.movetoobject because we need the follow command to return after $timeout.
The AI will recycle damaged ships.
skip if $leader-> is of class [Moveable Ship]
Is leader docked or out of sector?
